Class JuliaPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • JuliaPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class JuliaPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    The panel which displays the Julia set and contains all the calculations needed to draw it.
    Author:
    Daniel
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      JuliaPanel(Complex c, int fractalType)
      Creates a JuliaPanel, with default values for the max number of iterations and the fractal formula to be used.

        public JuliaPanel(Complex c,

        Creates a JuliaPanel, with default values for the max number of iterations and the fractal formula to be used. Sets the base complex number to the number given.
        Parameters:
